ValidationRule.description: Prevents edits to Decision records that are Submitted for Approval and Locked
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ((ISCHANGED(PgM_Decision_Date__c)) || (ISCHANGED(PgM_Decision_Made__c)) || (ISCHANGED(PgM_Description__c)) || (ISCHANGED(PgM_Due_Date__c)) || (ISCHANGED(PgM_L1_Capability__c)) || (ISCHANGED(PgM_Impact_to__c)) || (ISCHANGED(PgM_Key_Considerations__c)) || (ISCHANGED(PgM_Workstream_Parent__c)) || (ISCHANGED(PgM_Primary_Owner__c)) || (ISCHANGED(PgM_Secondary_Owner__c)) || (ISCHANGED(PgM_Status__c)) || (ISCHANGED(PgM_Visibility__c))) && PgM_Record_Locked__c = true && PgM_Current_Approver__c = false && ISPICKVAL(PgM_Approval_Lifecycle__c, 'Submitted for Approval')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Decision has been submitted for approval and the record is locked.
